name: Poly-amorous
description:
A visual novel built from the ground up using the Godot engine.

If you can't progress anymore, you're at the end of the script (yes, it's extremely short) Controls
  • Left click/Space/Enter: Progress normally
  • Right click/Shift: Fast forward

The whole engine is basically functional, but I didn't find the time to write the story and script it. You might consider this a prototype of a game that could be. Feel free to give me suggestions, as I hope I'll get the motivation to finish this.

Planned
  • Save system
  • Multiple endings
  • A secret character
  • More locations?
  • Supporting characters?
  • An original soundtrack?
